reviews.text:
Southend is great place to visit. 

If you go by train, don't use the Greater Anglia service Liverpool Street to Southend Victoria. It's a terrible service with cable problems and power failure. 😬😒🙁👎👎 

The best way to go by train is, from West Ham or Barking to Southend Central. 🙂 👍
Better screens displaying platforms and information
This station has a Costa coffee and well stocked convenience store. Clean toilets. There are regular services to London

It definitely has the run down feel of Southend to it. There's not enough ticket barriers here at all and the kids regularly push through the barriers instead of paying for their tickets. Disgusting. At least the station has step free access to the platforms and toilets too. Trains are usually every 20 minutes towards London.

A very pleasant station with good intergrated connections with bus and walking routes plus a secure cycle compound provided by Greater Anglia
Just 10 minutes away is Southend Central station and The Royals Shopping Centre. Right next to this station is The Beecroft Art Gallery and The Southend Central Museum and Planetarium
All I can I say is that this station is very pleasant and I have enjoyed my journey from here
